title: What are the lyrics of Katy Perry's song 'Daisies'? - Quora

response.answer_text: DAISIES LYRICS KATY PERRY | HOLLYWOOD DAISIES KATY PERRY Lyrics sung by KATY PERRYis Latest Hollywood song Produced by Liza Voloshin and directed by Liza Voloshin. Video is Released By KATY PERRY.
